data.title: Pulse 2014 APM Panel with Brian Fisher
data.meta_description: Pulse 2014 APM Panel with Brian Fisher - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. CONNECT WITH US: IT: Customized to Your Advantage Pulse 2014 APM Panel BRIAN FISHER Senior Enterprise Monitoring Consultant Public | Copyright © 2014 Prolifics

2. CONNECT WITH US: Introduction  Brian Fisher  Atlanta, GA  Senior Enterprise Monitoring Consultant  Prolifics  I am a Tivoli solutions consultant with more than 7 years experience in the IT industry working with top-tier companies. I am experienced in many aspects of the Tivoli monitoring portfolio including system, transaction, and application management. I have extensive experience monitoring application infrastructures including front-ends, middle-ware, and back- ends within a SOA or BPM environment.  I will be discussing my experiences in delivering the SmartCloud APM & APD solutions 2Public | Copyright © 2014 Prolifics

3. CONNECT WITH US: Application Performance Diagnostics  Easy to Deploy  Lightweight Infrastructure & Agent/DC  Infrastructure deploys in under 15 min with little configuration  Agent/DC for WebSphere deploys in under 15 min  Easy to Use UI  Meaningful arrangement of Dashboards  Simple yet powerful drill-down navigational flow that guides you to the source of your application performance problems  Easy to Scale  Intelligent DC Sampling  Allows for method-level tracing in production environments 3Public | Copyright © 2014 Prolifics

4. CONNECT WITH US: Problem Identification 4Public | Copyright © 2014 Prolifics

5. CONNECT WITH US: Problem Isolation 5Public | Copyright © 2014 Prolifics

6. CONNECT WITH US: Problem Determination 6Public | Copyright © 2014 Prolifics

7. CONNECT WITH US: Root Cause Analysis 7Public | Copyright © 2014 Prolifics
